About

I help businesses by providing savvy front-end development for websites and applications, delivering innovative web-based business solutions. Businesses and professionals enjoy working with me because I am passionate, dedicated, and provide a range of comprehensive digital marketing services to impact business.

IBM Cloud Computing

A public facing website for IBM Cloud website. We dramatically increased traffic, awareness, purchase of cloud services, and established best practices to scale to global production teams. Technology Stack: **CMS, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Grunt, Git**
  • Role: Frontend Developer Lead
  • Project Dates: May 2015 - February 2014
  • Posted: August 2017

IBM Think Management

  • Role: Frontend Developer Lead

  • Posted: August 2017
